TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Heping, title = Heping, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heping} }

S.FORM: Heping a sakuwan ku Taichung. kumud nu kalesakan, 1,006.12 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 900.79 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 62.11 km²), u kasabinawlan, 6,503 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 2,544 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 3,838 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 59%(Tayal) ku kasabinawlan. u tademaw ilabu nu siyang u paylang ku alumanay. nikasakuwakuwan Heping mala 8 a cuwen atu 13 ku niyazu'. kina 13 a niyazu'sa, Sqoyaw ,Tabuk , Slamaw , Lilang , M'ihu , Tgbin , L'olu , Kling , Pasing , Slamaw , Tbulan , S'yux , Hrung . Hepin Hepin Say-kaw-li-ke Atayal , Pasing, Taywan Ngayngay a kamu tu ta-pu a ngiha foˇ pinˇ ki+ han, sepat a kuwan foˇ pinˇ kiˊ, Taywan a kamu u Hô-pîng-khu han, nu Cung-hua-min-kou Tay-cung a kenis u cacayay a sakuwan a kenis, tini i Tay-cung a kenis nusawalian, u tademaw pakala tu 1.08 a mang, u saahebalal a hekal, cayay kakatuud ku tademaw, u tademaw saadidiay a kakitizaan, nu Tay-cung a kinis labu nu sakuwan u sacacayay a sakuwan yincumin a kakitizaan, u hekal u satabakiay a hamin nu kanatal satu u cacayay malabas tu cacay malebut ping-bang-kung-li sakuwan akakitizaan, i hamin nu kanatal kenis, niyazu' akuwan nu kenis, i sakuwan tu kenis u hekal sakasepat nu talakaway nu hamin nu kanatal. Hepin a kenis tungusay u sakuwan tu kakitizaan nu yincumin, sihulicay a enengan tu kakitizaan u pulung nu teked a sikuwan, situngus tu nu kenisay kakitizaan a sakuwan, Tay-cung a kenis nuzumaay a sakuwan a kenis caay kalecat ku kawaw, Hepin a yakuba nu Hepin teket a sakuwan, caay kunu Tay-cung a zebu tu nu taylinay a kabut, tayhiw nu Hepin u Hepin tu ku mikuwanay tu ni pahulicanay tu. laylay pikuwanan nu Lipun, nu Tay-cung-cuw Dung-se-cun a kenis banacadan a lala', uynian a kawaw izaw tu ku itawyaay a Taylin milisimet. Atayal Suan-ciy a niyazu' sikawaw tu a sakalahitay hawsa, hamin han ku kakitizaan palatusa tu ilikutay tu kakitizaan nu Atayal, May-bu-ping, Ciw-liang-si atu Ciya-yang, atu sabaw siwa a palaylinan cacay bataan ku niyazu', pacici'han misanad ku yincumin palimat mueneng, kya a kapah mikuwan. 2010 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 25 a demiad, zayhan 臺中a kenis, Taycuw tuse a sakuwan papulung han misumad tu sakuwan, pasumad han ku Taycung a Hepin , maales tu nuyaanay tu akenis situngus tu nu teked a sakuwan atu teked masapungungay. hekal a lala' ,東勢區. Hepin itini Taycuw unusawalian, nuwamisan makay satipan katukuh i nuwalian kakilac han tu Taywan-sen Miaw-li a kuwan Zuo-lan-cen a niyazu', Tay-an a kenis, Sin-cu a kuwan tu Can-se a kenis, Yi-lan a kuwan malabelaw ku Ta-tung a kenis, sawalian atu nutimulan atu kakilac tu Tay-wan-sen a Nabakuwan Siw-lin a kenis atu Nan-tuw a kuwan Ren-ay a kenis malabelaw tu Guo-sing a kenis satipan a belaw u Sin-se a kenis , Dung-se a kenis. . Hepin a kakitizaan tini i Sue-san abutu'an tu nusatimulan, izaw ku Ta-cia a sauwac mibesul , satipan a demiad u tatungusay a akuti'ay nuwaliay, nuwalian akiti cuete tatungusay ku akuti' tahkal kunu satipan satipan akuti' nuwalian cuede, unipalumaan izaw ku mami' nitulesan a nasi, alupal, Hepin tu nuwalian yadah kunipalumaan tu lingu, nasi, lupas,uyya nu buyu', lami' nu buyu',waneng nu wadu atuudan, u sienaw a lami' u angangan sapawapen a lala',u zuma Wu-lin a palimaan Ci-cia-wan a sauwac u kalikid nu Tay-wan yin-hua-cou-wen-kuy a buting a niyazu'. 高山: . buyu', ilabu nu Sue-san a buyu' atu kalaliwasak nu Cung-yang-san-may, 2,000-3,000 a depahan mazeked u buyu', tapingan a buyu' izaw ku yadah ku 3,000 malebut a debah ku buyu' katalakaw. 河流: . sauwac, i labu yadah ku adidi'ay tabakiay a sauwac a masa cipa' u masaupuay masatukalay a sauwac papusutay a helung u cascas a mahiniay aazihan, uynian a katitizaan i tini i pabaw nu Ta-cya a sauwac satipan nuwamisan tu Ze-you-li atu Da-kuan-li i tini i Da-an a sauwacan, i pabaw u sauwac a diheb San-ku-ti. . ungsin, Ta-yia a sauwac Ku-kuan a ungain i labu izaw ku cu'detay Ma-ling a ungsin. . Se-yung likecuay a buyu', tini i Taywan yi-lan a kuwan labu nu Da-tung a kenis, nika capiay a Hepin a lilis, nu Lan-yang a sauwac atu Da-yia a sauwac a kasananum. ngangan nu niyazu' Hepin a kakitizaan i tini i buyu' a kakitizaan, palalecad tu niyazu' izaw ku "Huan-san, Se-yuan, Wu-lin", Li-san ni niyazu' izaw ku "Cin-san, Cia-yang, Li-san, Sung-maw", Bu-ay ni niyazu' izaw ku "Li-leng, Sung-he, Ha-lun-tay, Ku-kuan, Ma-lin", Tyan-lun niyazu' izaw ku "Bay-leng", ,南勢里ni niyazu' izaw ku ,ni niyazu' izaw ku中坑里 ,自由里ni niyazu' izaw ku ,達觀里ni niyazu' izaw ku walu a kasiniyazu' duduc tu saculil tulu ku kakitizaan a zazan.

Heping a sakowan ko Taichong. komod no kalesakan, 1,006.12 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 900.79 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 62.11 km²), o kasabinawlan, 6,503 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 2,544 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 3,838 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 59%(Tayal) ko kasabinawlan. o tademaw ilabo no siyang o paylang ko alomanay. nikasakowakowan Heping mala 8 a cowen ato 13 ko niyazo'. kina 13 a niyazo'sa, Sqoyaw ,Tabok , Slamaw , Lilang , M'iho , Tgbin , L'olo , Kling , Pasing , Slamaw , Tbolan , S'yox , Hrong . Hepin Hepin Say-kaw-li-ke Atayal , Pasing, Taywan Ngayngay a kamo to ta-po a ngiha foˇ pinˇ ki+ han, sepat a kowan foˇ pinˇ kiˊ, Taywan a kamo o Hô-pîng-kho han, no Cong-hoa-min-koo Tay-cong a kenis o cacayay a sakowan a kenis, tini i Tay-cong a kenis nosawalian, o tademaw pakala to 1.08 a mang, o saahebalal a hekal, cayay kakatood ko tademaw, o tademaw saadidiay a kakitizaan, no Tay-cong a kinis labo no sakowan o sacacayay a sakowan yincomin a kakitizaan, o hekal o satabakiay a hamin no kanatal sato o cacayay malabas to cacay malebot ping-bang-kong-li sakowan akakitizaan, i hamin no kanatal kenis, niyazo' akowan no kenis, i sakowan to kenis o hekal sakasepat no talakaway no hamin no kanatal. Hepin a kenis tongosay o sakowan to kakitizaan no yincomin, siholicay a enengan to kakitizaan o polong no teked a sikowan, sitongos to no kenisay kakitizaan a sakowan, Tay-cong a kenis nozomaay a sakowan a kenis caay kalecat ko kawaw, Hepin a yakoba no Hepin teket a sakowan, caay kono Tay-cong a zebo to no taylinay a kabot, tayhiw no Hepin o Hepin to ko mikowanay to ni paholicanay to. laylay pikowanan no Lipon, no Tay-cong-cow Dong-se-con a kenis banacadan a lala', oynian a kawaw izaw to ko itawyaay a Taylin milisimet. Atayal Soan-ciy a niyazo' sikawaw to a sakalahitay hawsa, hamin han ko kakitizaan palatosa to ilikotay to kakitizaan no Atayal, May-bo-ping, Ciw-liang-si ato Ciya-yang, ato sabaw siwa a palaylinan cacay bataan ko niyazo', pacici'han misanad ko yincomin palimat moeneng, kya a kapah mikowan. 2010 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 25 a demiad, zayhan 臺中a kenis, Taycow tose a sakowan papolong han misomad to sakowan, pasomad han ko Taycong a Hepin , maales to noyaanay to akenis sitongos to no teked a sakowan ato teked masapongongay. hekal a lala' ,東勢區. Hepin itini Taycow onosawalian, nowamisan makay satipan katokoh i nowalian kakilac han to Taywan-sen Miaw-li a kowan Zoo-lan-cen a niyazo', Tay-an a kenis, Sin-co a kowan to Can-se a kenis, Yi-lan a kowan malabelaw ko Ta-tong a kenis, sawalian ato notimolan ato kakilac to Tay-wan-sen a Nabakowan Siw-lin a kenis ato Nan-tow a kowan Ren-ay a kenis malabelaw to Goo-sing a kenis satipan a belaw o Sin-se a kenis , Dong-se a kenis. . Hepin a kakitizaan tini i Soe-san aboto'an to nosatimolan, izaw ko Ta-cia a saowac mibesol , satipan a demiad o tatongosay a akoti'ay nowaliay, nowalian akiti coete tatongosay ko akoti' tahkal kono satipan satipan akoti' nowalian coede, onipalomaan izaw ko mami' nitolesan a nasi, alopal, Hepin to nowalian yadah konipalomaan to lingo, nasi, lopas,oyya no boyo', lami' no boyo',waneng no wado atoodan, o sienaw a lami' o angangan sapawapen a lala',o zoma Wo-lin a palimaan Ci-cia-wan a saowac o kalikid no Tay-wan yin-hoa-coo-wen-koy a boting a niyazo'. 高山: . boyo', ilabo no Soe-san a boyo' ato kalaliwasak no Cong-yang-san-may, 2,000-3,000 a depahan mazeked o boyo', tapingan a boyo' izaw ko yadah ko 3,000 malebot a debah ko boyo' katalakaw. 河流: . saowac, i labo yadah ko adidi'ay tabakiay a saowac a masa cipa' o masaopoay masatokalay a saowac paposotay a helong o cascas a mahiniay aazihan, oynian a katitizaan i tini i pabaw no Ta-cya a saowac satipan nowamisan to Ze-yoo-li ato Da-koan-li i tini i Da-an a saowacan, i pabaw o saowac a diheb San-ko-ti. . ongsin, Ta-yia a saowac Ko-koan a ongain i labo izaw ko co'detay Ma-ling a ongsin. . Se-yong likecoay a boyo', tini i Taywan yi-lan a kowan labo no Da-tong a kenis, nika capiay a Hepin a lilis, no Lan-yang a saowac ato Da-yia a saowac a kasananom. ngangan no niyazo' Hepin a kakitizaan i tini i boyo' a kakitizaan, palalecad to niyazo' izaw ko "Hoan-san, Se-yoan, Wo-lin", Li-san ni niyazo' izaw ko "Cin-san, Cia-yang, Li-san, Song-maw", Bo-ay ni niyazo' izaw ko "Li-leng, Song-he, Ha-lon-tay, Ko-koan, Ma-lin", Tyan-lon niyazo' izaw ko "Bay-leng", ,南勢里ni niyazo' izaw ko ,ni niyazo' izaw ko中坑里 ,自由里ni niyazo' izaw ko ,達觀里ni niyazo' izaw ko walo a kasiniyazo' dodoc to sacolil tolo ko kakitizaan a zazan.
